name: U-Boat
overview: In U-Boat the player controls a U-Boat from the German side in World War II. The player has to patrol the North Sea, but there are also other types of missions such as attacking Allied ships. Regularly it is necessary to return to the port to refuel. Many types of commands are performed on control panels and a lot of digitized pictures are used. A map view is used to plot courses, locate enemy ships and also control the submarine.
